text: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo Allah yahaga abahanuzi isezerano rikomeye (rigira riti) "Nimbaha igitabo nâ€™ubushishozi, maze Intumwa (Muhamadi) ikabageraho ishimangira ibyo mufite, mugomba kuzayemera mukanayirengera". Aravuga (Allah) ati "Ese murabyemeye munabigira isezerano ryanjye?" Baravuga bati "Turabyemeye". Aravuga ati "Ngaho nimubihamye, nanjye ndi kumwe namwe mu babihamya
